ResourceHeader.Description: Pinawa (PINA) Station is located in Pinawa,Manitoba, Canada. PINA is part of the University of Alberta CARISMA network. Magnetic Latitude: 61.1 Magnetic Longitude: 329.90 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 6.6333 Magnetic Declination: 2.86 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: GMAG: I. Mann for use of the GMAG data, and the CSA for support of the CARISMA network. ASI/GBO: S. Mende and E. Donovan for use of the ASI data, and the CSA for logistical support in fielding and data retrieval from the GBO stations
